name: Usain Bolt
description: Jamaican sprinter, multiple Olympic gold medalist, known for being the fastest man ever timed.

name: Michael Phelps
description: American swimmer, most decorated Olympian of all time, with numerous world records in swimming.

name: Lionel Messi
description: Argentine footballer, multiple times world's best player, known for his incredible skill and scoring ability.

name: Cristiano Ronaldo
description: Portuguese footballer, celebrated for his remarkable goal-scoring records and multiple Ballon d'Or awards.

name: Serena Williams
description: American tennis player, acclaimed for numerous Grand Slam singles titles and remarkable longevity in the sport.

name: Roger Federer
description: Swiss tennis player, known for his exceptional skill and record number of Grand Slam titles.

name: Tiger Woods
description: American golfer, one of the most successful golfers of all time, known for his dominance in golf.

name: LeBron James
description: American basketball player, known for his exceptional athleticism and multiple NBA championships.

name: Tom Brady
description: American football quarterback, known for his numerous Super Bowl victories and longevity in the sport.

name: Muhammad Ali
description: American boxer, celebrated for his achievements in heavyweight boxing and his charismatic personality.

name: Michael Jordan
description: American basketball player, widely regarded as one of the greatest basketball players of all time.

name: Pele
description: Brazilian footballer, legendary for his scoring ability and three FIFA World Cup victories.

name: Diego Maradona
description: Argentine footballer, known for his exceptional skill and the infamous 'Hand of God' goal.

name: Neymar Jr.
description: Brazilian footballer, known for his skillful playmaking, dribbling ability, and scoring prowess.

name: Shaun White
description: American snowboarder and skateboarder, multiple Olympic gold medalist, known for his athletic versatility.

name: Lewis Hamilton
description: British racing driver, multiple Formula One World Champion, known for his racing prowess and activism.

name: Simone Biles
description: American gymnast, celebrated for her Olympic and World Championship gold medals and dynamic performances.

name: Novak Djokovic
description: Serbian tennis player, renowned for his Grand Slam titles and consistent performances at the top level.

name: Rafael Nadal
description: Spanish tennis player, known for his dominance on clay courts and numerous French Open titles.

name: Sachin Tendulkar
description: Indian cricketer, regarded as one of the greatest batsmen in cricket history.

name: Kobe Bryant
description: American basketball player, renowned for his scoring ability, competitive spirit, and five NBA championships with the Lakers.

name: Liu Xiang
description: Chinese hurdler, revered as a national hero, won Olympic gold and broke world records, despite enduring injury setbacks.
